sys_element_mapping.value:
Trigger - Service Catalog➛...➛First name

Congratulations! Your LegacyLink admin request was approved.  We thank you for your commitment for becoming a LegacyLink admin for your family records. Please look out for another email containing instructions to access your account.

LegacyLink Support Team
